name: Arizona Derby Official Soundtrack
detailed_description:
Official "Arizona Derby" Soundtrack featuring numerous hip hop styled beats and remixes produced by Texas rap artist TXMic especially hyped for the "Arizona Derby" game and its content over course of the 4 years of development.

Track Listing:

  • 5 OFFROAD LUX MIX1
  • ARIZONA DERBY MIX1
  • ARIZONE IS CALLING MIX1
  • DRIVING AROUND THE WORLD ARIZONA DERBY MIX1
  • FOREST RAMPAGE MIX1
  • GAME ON MIX2
  • GAME_ON_MIX1
  • IMMA GO OFF MIX1
  • ONE MORE RACE MIX1
  • ONE RUSH ONE RIDE RAP MIX1
  • TROPICAL PARADISE MIX1
  • TWEAK AND TUNE MIX1
  • WHEN WE RIDE MIX1

The tracks can be found under root 'Arizona Derby' directory.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: any
  • Storage: 38 MB available space

  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
